name: A Bard's Request
objective: bring an authoritative history of the Unicorn Run to Rinnie
first_tasks: find an authoritative history of the Unicorn Run
tools: NONE
description:
"Sweet waters of the forest
flow through each den and glade
nourishing the unicorns
who lie graceful in the shade..."

I'm Rinnie, a bard and balladeer.
I have been working on a ballad about the Unicorn Run in the High Forest. I'd like to use a more reliable source than simply hearsay and folklore, though. If you ever find an authoritative history of the run in your travels, I'd love to get my hands on it.
A friend of mine gave me this Scroll of Protection From Poison and I have yet to make use of it, so you could have it as a reward.

name: A Book for Firebead
objective: bring "The History of the Fateful Coin" to Firebead Elvenhair
first_tasks: find "The History of the Fateful Coin"

quest_giver.name: Firebead Elvenhair
quest_giver.description: an elderly mage who loves books

tools: NONE
description:
Hello, I am Firebead Elvenhair: an elderly mage and a bookworm.
Oh, the world of books... I have heard that a new copy of that wondrous tome, "The History of the Fateful Coin," can be had for a pretty penny in one of the stores around here. If you would be so kind as to buy it for an old man like myself, I'd gladly reimburse you.
I'd even give you a little bonus to help in your travels, a book called "History of the Dead Three".

name: A Child in the Lighthouse
objective: save Ardrouine's little son from worgs
tools: NONE
description:
Please help me, I am just poor Ardrouine!
I don't know where else to turn. My little boy was playing in that abandoned lighthouse to the northwest when a pack of worgs surrounded it. Please just turn them back, and I can coax him down. There's not much time!
I can pay you 60 coins: this money is all my husband brought back from market this past week. My son's life is worth this and so much more.

name: A Contract Killing
objective: assassinate Cyrdemac
tools: NONE
description:
Perhaps... perhaps you are the type of people who can help me. I am in need of someone to... perform a service for me. I need someone... removed. This scoundrel is no innocent! He threatens to ruin my life with... with the spreading of... accusations. He threatens to ruin my reputation and standing unless I pay him an exorbitant sum almost weekly! I beg of thee... you must help me. His name is Cyrdemac and he frequents the Elfsong Tavern. I have not been there myself, but I hear it is quite a rough place. You could do the deed in the main bar itself and likely none would call the guards. I know not if he will have friends with him though. Thank you for this.
Upon your return I shall pay you 2,000 gold. A small price to have this embarrassment removed.

name: Albert and His Dog
objective: bring Rufie to Albert
tools: Albert gives the player Rufie's chew toy to draw out Rufie
description:
Hi! I'm Albert.
'Scuse me. I ever so sowwy to bother, but could you help me? I've lost my little dog Rufie and I can't find him. He's probably ever so scared wight now. Poor Rufie isn't used to strange places an' people. You're sure to know him when you see him, 'cuz he's just the cutest little thing. Here, take this as well. His favorite chew toy, it is. He'll know you're a friend if you have it in your hands.
I have a small reward for you: it's another of his chew things, but we can get more where we're going.

name: A Corpse for Arkion
objective: bring a corpse to Arkion
tools: NONE
description:
The name's Arkion.
I've got a dirty deed fer ya. How 'bout you go down into the sewers and bring me up a body. Now, I don't ask questions 'bout how you come 'bout them and I don't want any questions 'bout what I use 'em fer. Bring 'em to me when ya find 'em.
There'll be 250 gold pieces to relieve the stink of it all.

name: Alatos and the Thieves' Guild
objective: steal spellbook, statuette, and artifact fragment, and bring them to Alatos Thuibuld

first_task_locations.name: Oberan's Estate
first_task_locations.description: a house inhabited by Shandalar's daughters

quest_giver.name: Alatos Thuibuld
quest_giver.description: the leader of the Thieves' Guild

reward.description: a magical weapon or two if the player performs well

tools: Shandalar lives inside a Halruaan skyship
Shandalar knows how to produce Halruaan skyships: Shandalar plans to sell the knowledge of building Halruaan skyships to Grand Duchess Liia Jannath
Halruaans do not want others to obtain their skyships
spellbook, statuette, and artifact fragment are the ingredients needed to keep the skyships aloft: Shandalar's daughters have them
description:
I am Alatos Thuibuld, though I thank you not to mention that too often.
A local wizard by the name of Shandalar makes his home in a moored Halruaan skyship. It would appear that he has the knowledge to reproduce these flying marvels and is currently organizing the sale of the recipe to Grand Duchess Liia Jannath. He has drawn up a set of rituals and has procured an artifact fragment and an ancient statuette vital to the spell that keeps the ships aloft. These he has divided amongst his daughters until the deal is to proceed. I have been contacted by a representative of the Halruaans, and they have no wish to see scores of flying ships manufactured in every port. You are to infiltrate the place of exchange that is known as Oberan's Estate, steal the ingredients, and return here with them. Simple enough.
You would be well paid. Enough gold to give you a backache and, if I am well pleased, mayhaps a magical weapon or two. Perhaps a little more, perhaps a little less. It entirely depends upon your performance.

name: Arkion's Amulet
objective: steal Arkion's amulet and bring it to Nemphre
tools: Arkion was Nemphre's lover
description:
Mmm, be a sweet one. Could you do a favor for Nemphre?
An old lover of mine has followed me here to the city and has been threatening me with some very dark magic. His name is Arkion and, if you could just get a certain amulet of his to me, perhaps there are a few things I could do for you? Such as giving you a Scroll of Vampiric Touch, mmn?

name: Arkion and Nemphre
objective: steal Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet and Nemphre's Onyx Ring, and bring them to Ordulinian
first_tasks: find Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet and Nemphre's Onyx Ring
tools: Arkion and Nemphre used to be lovers
Arkion wants Nemphre's Onyx Ring
Nemphre wants Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet
description:
Ah, fair adventurers, I'm Ordulinian.
The roads of this fair city are lined with fools, are they not? Two of the greatest are Arkion and Nemphre, necromancers grown bitter over lost love. Alas, but they use petty trinkets as their excuse for enmity. Nemphre covets Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet and Arkion dreams of her Onyx Ring. Steal those trinkets and bring them to me and perhaps those two fools can at last find peace.
For your troubles I will give you a Cloak of Non-Detection. It may be of some use to you in the future.

name: A Ring for a Lady
objective: bring an angel skin ring to Fergus

quest_giver.name: Fergus
quest_giver.description: a happy man who wants to give a gift to his wife

tools: NONE
description:
I'm Fergus, a very happy man.
I've got to admit, I ain't never been happier. Got a letter from my lady and she's gonna be home reeeal soon... Just gotta find me a pretty little ring for her pretty little finger and all's gonna be just fine, just fine. But my lady, she transcends gold or silver or fancy stones. She'll have nothing less than an angel skin ring from me.
For reward, if you're ever needin' a little work around here, check with Scar, second-in-command of the city guard. You can tell him I recommended you.

name: A Rogue Ogre
objective: bring the Girdle of Piercing to Unshey
first_tasks: kill the ogre holding the Girdle of Piercing

first_task_locations.description: to the south of the Friendly Arm Inn

reward.description: a history book written by Unshey

tools: Unshey had to bargain her new Girdle of Piercing for her life
description:
Hey, I'm Unshey, an aspiring writer.
Have you heard? There's a rogue ogre with a belt fetish to the south of the Friendly Arm Inn. I had to bargain my new girdle of piercing for my life out there. Wasn't even interested in an autographed copy of my book. Hey, if you can get that belt back to me, I'd be mighty grateful.
You'll get 95 gold pieces for your trouble, and a new history book I've just completed.

name: A Curious Business Proposal
objective: buy everything from Delsvirftanyon for 500 gold
tools: Delsvirftanyon sells things for the tourists in the Durlag's Tower, but bandits on the road keep people away
Delsvirftanyon has ward tokens of all shapes and sizes
description:
I'm Delsvirftanyon, a merchant by trade.
I sell the small and shinies for the tourists in the Durlag's Tower but there are none now there! Bandits on the roads keep the people off and away so I'm stuck with all this stock I am. Ward tokens I have of all shapes and size. Some I found by elven ruin and some I made myself I made. Maybe some good or maybe all bad but don't they all look pretty? I tell you what I will. I'll sell you everything I have you buy for low low price of 500 gold is all. Then I go home where they appreciate a bauble shine.
Buy or no and walk the walk?

name: A Hidden Base in the Cloakwood
objective: investigate Tazok and his group of bandits
tools: Tazok has been going to the Cloakwood regularly
there are important documents in the chest here
description:
This whole thing is dirty to the core, that's what I know! These aren't your ordinary bandits here. Tazok's been making regular visits to the Cloakwood, so that's where I'd start if I were you. There are some documents in that chest that might be worth taking a look at, too.
Now go step on some toes, all right? And you can tell them Ender Sai sent you.

name: An Errand for Fuller
objective: bring a quarrel of crossbow bolts to Fuller
tools: Fuller knows the player
description:
Hey kid, it's me, Fuller.
I need a quarrel of crossbow bolts. If you could get some off Winthrop at the inn, I'll reimburse you. there'll be a dagger in it for you too. My father killed a hobgoblin with it once, many years ago. Stabbed him right in the back, he did. It ain't no broadsword, but it'll do in a pinch.

name: Ankheg Culling
objective: kill exactly 4 ankhegs
tools: NONE
description:
I'm Gerde, a ranger.
You've come here to fight ankhegs? Well, listen up: it's mating season, so it's primarily females coming up to the surface, looking to put on a little extra weight. They're hungry, they're aggressive, and there are a lot of them. Now, the point of this exercise is not to exterminate them, but to keep their population to a manageable level. Remember, they aerate the soil and thereby improve crop yields by as much as 15%. Food is going to be scarce enough in the next few years, so keep that in mind when you're out there. No more than four ankhegs per party. After that it's catch and release, all right? Most of the activity starts about fifty yards to the east.
Now move out, everyone. You'll get 75 gold pieces, if you stick to the quota.

name: Arcand the Mad
objective: bring Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring to him
first_tasks: find Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring

reward.description: a bottle that can burn the player

tools: Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring is cursed
description:
I like you, yes I do (wertle, wertle, wertle, wooo...) and I know of a way to make you like me too (wertle, wertle, wertle-wooooo...).
Down by the ocean, down by the sea, there's a pirate ship waiting for you and for me. Bring me what's in it, but don't ever wear it, or sure enough, soon enough, you'll wertle too... A beautiful ring! Where to get it? (Most likely quite near where exactly I put it...) Wertle, oh wertle, oh dear wertle-wooo... wertle, oh wertle, oh woo...
Oh, I know what you're thinking of Mad Arcand the Stinking who takes what you give him and gives not in return. So there is this bottle, but please don't topple or (wertle, poor wertle), you'll surely get burned.

name: Nadarin and the Basilisk
objective: kill a basilisk and return to Nadarin for your reward
tools: NONE
description:
Hey, you! Are you either bored or foolish? Either way, I, Nadarin, could use your services.
Some wiseacre tried to send a basilisk by freight and now it's broken free and is making a mess of one of the warehouses at the harbor.
There'll be 500 gold pieces for taking care of that on such short notice. Also, you might want these. They're an item I obtained from a fence I know in a far-away city. You never know, they might fit you.

name: Bassilus the Murderer
objective: kill Bassilus and bring his holy symbol to Kelddath Ormlyr
tools: NONE
description:
A warning from Kelddath Ormlyr:
know that there is a madman by the name of Bassilus who roams the wilderness killing any innocents that happen along his path. He's been last sighted in Red Canyons.
If you were to dispose of him and bring back his holy symbol, there is a large reward offered. It is a grisly task, but sometimes there is little choice.

name: Branwen Rescued
objective: unpetrify Branwen
first_tasks: buy a Stone to Flesh scroll from Zeke for 500 gold

characters.name: Branwen
characters.description: a warrior woman turned into stone

tools: NONE
description:
Come one, come all! Zeke's got something to show you!
Take a look at the stone warrior maiden. How long has she been trapped in this petrified form, no one knows! Be the first to learn, for the mere price of 500 gold. For that small amount of money, I shall give you a magic scroll, and with this scroll you can release the maiden from her stone prison. Think of the gratitude she would feel to her saviors. Perhaps she's a princess from some far-off land, or maybe a powerful sorceress in search of a concubine. You can't afford not to know!
Buy the scroll!

name: Brielbara's Baby
objective: bring Yago's spellbook to Brielbara

quest_giver.name: Brielbara
quest_giver.description: a female mage of minor power

characters.name: Namara
characters.description: a baby and Brielbara's only daughter

tools: Yago has cursed Namara: Brielbara can undo the curse with Yago's spellbook
description:
Travelers! I am Brielbara, a mage of minor power.
I'll pay you 200 gold, not much for heroic adventurers, but all that I have.
An evil mage has laid a curse upon my only child, Namara. She is slowly wasting away and, without help, she'll die. The mage who did this is named Yago, and I'm sure that he possesses the remedy to the curse. Would you track him down for me, please? He's been staying at a place called the Low Lantern. It's the playground for the wicked and depraved, a ship where prostitutes ply their trade. All I want you to do is find him and take his spellbook. I have enough magical skill to reverse the curse if I had the formula for his spell.

name: Colquetle's Family
objective: find out what happened to Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife
first_tasks: find Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife

characters.description: Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife

tools: Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife traveled away and went missing
description:
What cruel whim of the fates controls this torment of me?!
I, Mr. Colquetle, have heard nothing from my son and his wife for nigh unto a week now, and all else pales in importance until I do. I should have known better than to allow his travel in these dangerous times.

name: Cordyr and the Sirines
objective: kill the sirines that sank Cordyr's fishing boat

first_task_locations.description: down south, where the Cloud Peaks tumble into the sea

quest_giver.name: Cordyr
quest_giver.description: a fisherman from down south, where the Cloud Peaks tumble into the sea

tools: NONE
description:
Pleasure to meet you. The name's Cordyr.
I'm from down south, where the Cloud Peaks tumble into the sea. A pair of sirines has been trying to move into the area. They sank my fishing boat and put me right out of work. *sigh* If they weren't so dang beautiful, it would be a lot easier to convince people of how much of a nuisance they can be. Can you kill them for me? It's a dirty deed but it's the cost of civilization, isn't it?
You can have a haste scroll as payment.

name: Dreppin's Cow
objective: give an antidote potion to Dreppin so he can cure Nessa's illness
first_tasks: find one of Hull's antidote potions
tools: NONE
description:
Hi. I'm Dreppin. Nice day, ain't it? Too bad Nessa the cow here ain't enjoyin' it though, her bein' sick 'n all.
I need to get her one of them potions of antidote off Hull. He stayed up drinkin' last night and got hauled outta bed to man the gates early this morning, so I bet he's got a few of them lyin' around somewheres.

name: Drienne's Cat
objective: bring Pixie to Drienne
tools: NONE
description:
I'm just a little girl Drienne.
Mommy says if you ever need to know something important, you should ask an adult. Pixie, my cat, she was playing close to the waterfall and slipped... I hope she's all right.
You can have this scroll Daddy gave me, if you find Pixie. I can't read the words yet anyways.

name: Dryad of the Cloud Peaks
objective: save Dryad of the Cloud Peaks' ancient oak from dying
first_tasks: stop a pair of people from attacking Dryad of the Cloud Peaks' ancient oak
tools: Dryad of the Cloud Peaks dies if her ancient oak dies
description:
Please, kind spirits, a wondrous ancient oak is in peril. It is the tree to which I am bonded! If it dies, I, Dryad of the Cloud Peaks, die.
It is about to be attacked by two who would defile the majesty of nature. They have avoided my charms and must be stopped before irreparable harm is done. Would you heed my plea?
There is a potion that might help you on your journeys.

name: Edwin and Dynaheir
objective: kill Dynaheir

first_task_locations.description: west of Nashkel, near the gnoll stronghold

reward.description: one year of Edwin's services as a wizard

tools: NONE
description:
I am Edwin, a wizard, and I require you! (Yes, they will do nicely.)
I would have you kill a witch, the witch Dynaheir. She is treacherous, but with your participation I foresee no difficulty. Last I heard of her, she was traveling to the west of Nashkel, close to the gnoll stronghold located there. Will you assist?
The prize I offer would surely be beyond measure in your meager understanding. Your payment shall be one year of my services as a wizard. I am sure you agree that my guidance will be far more valuable than any monetary sum.

name: Kagain's Quest
objective: kill the bandits that raided the caravan under Kagain's protection

first_task_locations.description: on route from Amn to Baldur's Gate

quest_giver.name: Kagain
quest_giver.description: an owner of a caravan escort service

reward.description: a share of booty, if there's no one left alive to claim it

tools: NONE
description:
Greetings, I'm Kagain.
I hire mercenaries to escort caravans on route from Amn to Baldur's Gate. Right now I'm lookin' for some strong sword arms, and I'm willing to pay high. It seems that one of the caravans under my protection never arrived at Baldur's Gate, and I need to know what happened. I've been having a lot of problems with bandit activity lately, but they've always only taken the cargo and let the caravan go afterward.
I'll pay each of you 30 gold per dead bandit, plus a share of any booty, if there's no one left alive to claim it.

name: Fahrington's Scroll
objective: return Fahrington's scroll of wisdom to him
first_tasks: find the tasloi holding Fahrington's scroll of wisdom

reward.description: Fahrington will brighten the player's karma

tools: NONE
description:
I am Fahrington.
A tasloi has stolen my scroll of wisdom, wanderer, and fled eastward towards the ettercap's lair. The poor tasloi is probably quite dead by now but the ettercaps, of course, will not recognize the scroll's value.
If you could retrieve it for me, I promise to brighten your karma.

name: Farmer Brun's Missing Son
objective: find Nathan
tools: Nathan and his friends disappeared some days ago
description:
I beseech thee, kind soul, please help.
I'm farmer Brun. It's strange happenings at my farm, and I've not the strength I once had. I've nothing to offer, and even if I did I doubt such as you would have need of it. My son Nathan and his friends went looking for our missing cattle, then they just up and disappeared! Been gone for days now and, with all the bandits around, who knows what's happened. I don't know where they were heading, but I saw some sort o' tracks to the west.
Please find Nathan. I can't afford to keep the farm without my son.

name: Firebead's Scroll
objective: bring Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll to him
first_tasks: get Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll from Tethtoril

reward.description: a protection spell cast by Firebead Elvenhair

tools: Firebead Elvenhair left his identify scroll to Tethtoril
description:
I, Firebead Elvenhair, have a small errand for you.
I left an identify scroll with Tethtoril, in the inner grounds. He should be done examining it by now, so if you could fetch it for me, I'd be grateful. I have a great use for those types of scrolls.
Allow me to cast a little spell on you as a reward. It will protect you from any evil you might meet tonight.

name: G'axir the Seer
objective: bring a sphene gem to G'axir the Seer
tools: NONE
description:
Your future... is hemmed in darkness.
Your lives... are in the balance.
Act wisely, act judiciously... and bring me the sphene gem, should you find it...
You... are a light entering darkness.
You... are a seeker of truths.
You... are more than you realize.
The Seer has spoken it because the Seer knows the fear you harbor, the fear you shall yet become.
In the lair of the basilisk, you will find a sphene gem... You would do well to bring it to the Seer.

name: Ghorak the Diseased
objective: take Kereph's skull to Agnasia

first_task_locations.description: behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs

tools: Ghorak was cursed with an illness for killing his brother
Agnasia knows how to cure Ghorak
description:
For your own health and that of your children, come no closer.
I, Ghorak, was cursed with this fell disease as punishment for my wickedness... No, your potions and magics are of little use. The only way to cure this sickness is to right the wrongs of the past. Behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs, you will find the skull of my brother, Kereph. Take it to Agnasia in The Lady's Hall. She will know what to do with it.

name: Gurke's Cloak
objective: return Gurke's cloak to him
first_tasks: find the tasloi holding Gurke's cloak

quest_giver.name: Gurke
quest_giver.description: an old man who is tired of hearing jokes about losing his cloak in Cloakwood

tools: a tasloi stole Gurke's cloak in Cloakwood
description:
Old Gurke had his famous cloak stolen right off his back by a batch of paltry tasloi.
Yeah, yeah, it's old news and if you make one crack about the Cloakwood being an appropriate place to lose it, at least, I'll put your liver on the menu. Now move on and let the next people in line have their laugh.
However, if you happen to find my cloak, I'll give you 280 gold pieces for returning it.

name: Half-ogres Near Beregost
objective: kill the half-ogres who battled Bjornin
tools: half-ogres wounded Bjornin
description:
I'm still healing from my latest encounters. They did quite a number on me, those half-ogres. There's a band of them fortifying themselves in the mountains south-southwest of here...
If you could give them a taste of justice by testing your steel against them, that would do me, Bjornin, proud.
In an effort to encourage such deeds of righteousness, allow me to present to you this shield as a reward upon your return...

name: Hull's Sword
objective: fetch Hull's sword
first_tasks: find Hull's sword in his chest

first_task_locations.description: on the right side of the barracks

tools: Hull knows the player
there is an antidote in Hull's chest: Dreppin needs an antidote for Nessa
description:
Hey, kid, it's me, Hull.
I woke late this morning and left my sword in the barracks before going on duty. If you want to get it for me, it's in the chest at the foot of my bed on the right side of the barracks. Quick now, before the Gatewarden catches me without it.
You'll also find an antidote there. I think Dreppin needs one for old Nessa.
You'll get 20 gold pieces for saving my skin from the Chief.

name: Jared and the Bear
objective: kill the bear pursuing Jared

first_task_locations.description: on the other side of that bridge

quest_giver.name: Jared
quest_giver.description: a man running away from a bear

tools: NONE
description:
Oh, thank goodness someone came by.
I'm Jared. There's a bear on the other side of that bridge, and it's coming this way! I can't run anymore!
Please hold it off — I'll give you anything!

name: Joia's Flamedance Ring
objective: return Joia's Flamedance Ring to her
first_tasks: find the hobgoblins who stole Joia's Flamedance Ring

first_task_locations.description: north of the Friendly Arms Inn

quest_giver.name: Joia
quest_giver.description: a woman who lost a precious item

tools: NONE
description:
Hey there, you're new here, aren't you? Could I, Joia, trouble you a moment?
I need someone to go club some heads for me. I was ambushed by a band o' hobgoblins within sight of this inn's walls. Robbed me blind, they did, and I want to return the favor.
I don't care about most of my things, but I want to get my ring back. My father gave it to me, you understand? The creatures were just north of the inn. Bring my ring back here when you get it. You'll know it when you see it. It's a Flamedance Ring, and very striking.

name: Joseph's Wife
objective: investigate Joseph's fate for his wife
tools: Joseph wears a greenstone wedding ring on his left hand
Joseph went missing in the mines
men have disappeared in the mines before
description:
My husband is missing in the mines. All I know about the mines are that men keep on disappearing in their hellish depths.
My husband is one of the miners, but he hasn't been home for weeks. His name is Joseph, and he wears his wedding ring on his left hand. It's a greenstone ring.
Please, find him and tell me how he is doing!

name: Kylee's Dagger
objective: return Kylee's dagger to its owner
tools: NONE
description:
Are you going to be going down into the mines? If so, could you return this dagger to Kylee?
He dropped it when he went into the mine the other day and I haven't seen him since.

name: Laerta and Louise
objective: get rid of a bogeyman that scares Laerta and Louise every night
tools: Laerta and Louise are twin sisters
description:
Hi! I'm Laerta. That's my twin sister, Louise.
Mom and Dad don't believe us, but there's a bogeyman that comes and looks in our window every night. We're real glad we're twins because, if there were only one of us, then there'd be no one to hold on to when we get scared. Scare away the bogeyman, would you?
Mom says to give this scroll as a reward. I think it's supposed to protect you from any other bogeypeople you find.

name: Landrin's Possessions
objective: deal with the spider infestation in Landrin's cellar
first_tasks: kill spiders, and fetch Landrin's husband's boots and Landrin's bottle of wine

first_task_locations.description: Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn

reward.description: gold pieces for fetching Landrin's husband's old boots
something extra for bodies of spiders and Landrin's bottle of wine

tools: Landrin gives the player antidote potions against poison
description:
Hey, I'm Landrin.
I've got an infestation of poisonous spiders in my cellar in Beregost. You'll know the house when you see it: just to the west of the Jovial Juggler Inn.
Here, take these potions with you. They're antidotes against the poison.
Keep whatever you don't use and I'll give you an extra 120 gold pieces if you bring back my husband's old boots that he keeps down there. If you bring back one of their bodies and my ol' bottle of wine as well, I might toss in a little something extra too.

name: Larceny at the Hall of Wonders
objective: steal a telescope without hurting anyone, just like Danilo Thann of Waterdeep
tools: NONE
description:
HELLO! SHHH! Shh... ah... um... I mean, hello.
Might I have but a moment of your, ah, time? I should like to procure your talents for a, ah, unique service, though it's not like you would have to do anything socially untoward. Okay, it's stealing, but it's only the one item: A wondrously curious little toy from distant land. What did they call it? Oh, yes, a "telescope," of all things. It's a misleading name for such an interestingly crafted artifact. "Golden Extra-Farseer" would have suited its craftsmanship so much better. The tele-thingy is on display at the Hall of Wonders, and were it in the possession of anyone else it might be purchasable. It's roguery on par with Danilo Thann of Waterdeep, and I don't want anybody hurt.
I'll pay you well: 500 gold for one night's work. It's better than you could hope for in a year on the docks!

name: Marek and Lothander
objective: get an antidote before you die of Marek's poison
first_tasks: talk to Haspur who can possibly reverse Lothander's geas
tools: Marek has poisoned the player: the player has 10 days to live
Lothander wants to help the player get an antidote to the poison
Lothander was forced to work for the Iron Throne with a geas
description:
I am Lothander.
I do not wish you harm. My partner, Marek, has poisoned you. While you slept, he slipped a slow-acting magical poison into your food. You have about ten days to live. Common priest spells won't help you. Only one thing can, and that's the antidote. I can help you find it, if you help me first.
My problem is this: I don't work for the Iron Throne because I wish to but rather because I have been forced. I have been enspelled with a geas. If I do not obey everything that Marek orders of me the spell will take effect and I shall waste away. I need a way to rid myself of the spell. I know of a diviner at the market square who may have the answers I seek, but I don't have the money to pay him. Will you help me?

name: Melicamp the Chicken
objective: turn Melicamp of Beregost back into a human from a chicken

first_task_locations.name: High Hedge
first_task_locations.description: a tower directly to the west of Beregost

quest_giver.name: Melicamp of Beregost
quest_giver.description: a mage adept in the mystical arts

characters.name: Thalantyr
characters.description: a powerful mage, and Melicamp of Beregost's master

tools: Melicamp of Beregost was turned into a chicken by a spell gone wrong
Melicamp of Beregost will nest in the player's pack
description:
Buc-becaw! HELLLLP-becaw! I am "no ordinary talking chicken," and I am in need of your *cluck* help. I am Melicamp of Beregost, a *cluck* mage adept in the mystical arts.
A... misread... incantation seems to be *cluck* the source of my troubling form. 'Tis been over a month since I *cluck* uttered a polymorph spell, and I simply cannot return to my normal *cluck* form!
There is a tower directly to the west of *cluck* Beregost, about which can be found the mage Thalantyr. I am his apprentice, and I am certain he will *cluck* aid me. I'll just nestle in your pack until we get there.

name: Mirianne's Husband
objective: tell Mirianne whether you found information about Roe or not
tools: Roe went on a business trip to Amn
description:
My husband had to make a sudden business trip to Amn and I'm so worried for him.
"Mirianne," he always said, "Mirianne, who knows the road better than old Roe?" But the highways just aren't as safe as they once were and there hasn't been a messenger from Amn here in months.
Could you keep your eyes open along the southern roads and let me know if you find anything?

name: Noralee's Gauntlets
objective: bring Noralee's gauntlets to her
first_tasks: find Noralee's gauntlets inside a shipping crate
tools: NONE
description:
I'm Noralee.
I just had some new armor shipped in from a far-away city and I'm afraid I must have dropped the gauntlets into one of the shipping crates somewhere between here and the harbor.
Please, if you can find them before somebody else picks them up, I would be most grateful.

name: Nadine and Euric
objective: give Euric a good luck talisman and return to Nadine

characters.name: Euric
characters.description: Nadine's youngest son, who knows how to take care of himself

tools: Euric ran away from home
Nadine gives the player a good luck talisman
description:
I, Nadine, desperately need someone's help.
Euric, my youngest son, has run away again... He's always had a touch of the wanderer in him and he knows how to take care of himself, but... Oh, I'm just worried sick. This city gets more dangerous every day... If you find him, could you give him this good luck talisman? I'm sure we'd all sleep a little better.
Let me give you this necklace as a token of my thanks upon your return. I don't know if it's worth anything but it has been in the family for years.

name: Ogre Hunting
objective: kill ogres

quest_giver.name: Sarhedra
quest_giver.description: a woman who does not like the player

tools: NONE
description:
Hmph. I am Sarhedra and I don't like you.
I bet you're another one of those adventurers wantin' to change the world or somethin'. Well, go pick on the ogres to the south if it will make you feel better.
Go find someone else to talk to, I'm no good at this quest stuff. I have... ummm... people to see and places to be.

name: Perdue's Short Sword
objective: kill the gnoll who stole Perdue's short sword

first_task_locations.description: in the hills west of Beregost, close to the High Hedge

quest_giver.name: Perdue
quest_giver.description: a man who doesn't like gnolls

tools: NONE
description:
Hullo. The name's Perdue.
There's a gnoll 'oled up in the hills due west of 'ere, close to the High Hedge. Damn thievin' ball-o-fur stole my short sword two days back. The sword ain't worth the tin she's made from.
I'll give ya 75 gold pieces just to seal that yappin' mouth of 'is for good.

name: Petrine's Cat
objective: bring Angel's angel skin ring to Petrine
tools: NONE
description:
Hi, I'm Petrine and my folks aren't around no more and I ran away from my Uncle Bheren 'cause he's real mean.
My cat's really an angel, though, and she protects me when bad things happen. Or at least she did. I can't find her now, though. I think she went back to my uncle's to get her ring. There's this ring that she loves to play with, but when I ran away I had to leave it at my nasty uncle's. If you could just get me the ring, I'm sure Angel would come back.
Could you do it, oh please?

name: Phlydia's Book
objective: bring "The History of Halruaa" back to Phlydia
tools: Phlydia knows the player
description:
Oh, hello! It's me, Phlydia!
Have you seen my copy of "The History of Halruaa" anywhere? You know how I can't stand the constant shuffling of arthritic feet up in the library... So I thought I'd get a bit of fresh air just east of here and... Oh, I hate being so absent-minded! Please, if you find it, I really do need it back.
If you do, you can take this little gem of mine. Maybe a merchant will give you a little something for it.

name: Prism's Emeralds
objective: return 2 emeralds to Oublek

quest_giver.name: Oublek
quest_giver.description: a man who hands out bounties on criminals

tools: Oublek knows the player
Prism the Sculptor stole 2 emeralds
Prism the Sculptor can live or die
description:
It's me, Oublek.
A bit of nonsense from a local artist named Prism. Made off with a couple of emeralds, he did.
There is a reward for the return of the gems: a 300 gold bounty.
Prism's fate is of less importance.

name: Quinn's Friend
objective: bring something belonging to Nester to Quinn

first_task_locations.description: upriver, along the east bank, north of the bitch priestess

characters.name: Nester
characters.description: Quinn's friend, who was killed by ankhegs

tools: NONE
description:
I'm Quinn. There's some ankhegs causin' chaos upriver, alon' the east bank, just north o' that bitch priestess.
They took down my pal, Nester, and dang near hauled me under too. 'At's why I'm so glum now. Nester's mama's gonna want somepin' of 'is to bury, but I'm still gettin' too many nightmares and all to go back there.

name: Killing Rats
objective: kill rats
tools: NONE
description:
I thought I asked you to clean the rats out of this building yesterday, already. Hop to it! Get in there!
Ah yes, kill them like the rats that they are! A glorious battle unlike any this world has ever seen...
I'll give you 5 gp, don't spend it all in one place.

name: Rescuing Dynaheir
objective: free Dynaheir from gnolls with Minsc

first_task_locations.description: the gnoll stronghold, in the west

quest_giver.name: Minsc
quest_giver.description: a noble warrior and Dynaheir's protector

tools: Minsc, Boo, and Dynaheir traveled far to explore this land
gnolls have captured Dynaheir
Minsc and Boo will join the player
description:
Greetings, we are Minsc and Boo. Boo is my faithful hamster companion, and more than he seems.
We have traveled far to explore this land, but now my charge Dynaheir has been taken from us. 'Twas gnolls, and once we have tracked them I will beat sense into their heads until they release her.
Accompany us, and bards will sing the deeds of Minsc and Boo... and friends.
Onward to the gnoll stronghold in the west!

name: Returning Dradeel's Spellbook
objective: destroy the lycanthropes' lair, and bring Dradeel's spellbook back to its owner
first_tasks: find the lycanthropes' lair and Dradeel's spellbook within it

quest_giver.name: Dradeel
quest_giver.description: an elven mage who was a guide to Balduran

reward.description: a way out of this island

tools: Dradeel converted to the Church of Selûne recently
there are werewolves everywhere
Dradeel might find a way out of this island if his spellbook was returned to him
description:
I am Dradeel, mage and recent convert to the Church of Selûne.
I was the guide for Balduran's brave adventures to the ends of the world and beyond. The wolf-men are everywhere. The lycanthropes' lair is in Balduran's ship. My spellbook lies within. With it, I am a powerful mage. Without it, I am the pauper that stands before you. With my spellbook retrieved, I may be able to discover a way off of the island.
If you go to destroy the lycanthropes' lair, I would ask that you find my book.

name: Safana's Treasure Hunt
objective: get Black Alaric's treasure for yourself and Safana
first_tasks: find Black Alaric's treasure with Safana

first_task_locations.description: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep

tools: Safana will join the player
Safana has a map that shows the location of Black Alaric's treasure
description:
My name is Safana and I can make you richer than you could imagine.
I know where the pirate Black Alaric dumped his greatest trove of treasure. Knowing that you are a dynamic and intelligent person, I know you'd want to join me in a venture to get this treasure.
Well, we should be off then. From what my map showed, the pirate cove is located somewhere along the coast, just south of Candlekeep.

name: Sam and Lena
objective: save Sam from dying

characters.name: Gellana Mirrorshade
characters.description: a priestess who can help Sam

tools: Lena and Sam have been wandering in the wilderness
Sam will join the player
description:
Please wait a moment, kind traveler! You've got to help me!
My name is Lena. You must forgive me for my appearance, but I've been wandering the wilderness for more than a week now.
My friend is badly hurt, and he might die if he doesn't get assistance soon. His name is Sam. If you were to take him to Gellana Mirrorshade at the Temple of Wisdom, she'd help him.
Please, can you do this?

name: Samuel the Deserter
objective: capture Samuel

quest_giver.description: a member of the Flaming Fist

characters.name: Samuel
characters.description: a man who deserted the Flaming Fist

groups.name: Flaming Fist
groups.description: a mercenary organization promoting order and law

tools: Samuel is traveling with a woman
description:
I am a proud member of the Flaming Fist. I've been searching for a deserter. His name is Samuel, and he should be traveling with a woman.
There is a bounty of 50 gold for his capture.

name: Searching for Balduran's Helmet
objective: bring the Helm of Balduran to Degrodel

first_task_locations.description: the art collector's estate, west of the fairgrounds, in the center of Baldur's Gate

items.name: Helm of Balduran
items.description: the helmet of a legendary hero

groups.description: mercenaries, a group of evil men

tools: mercenaries were petrified while trying to break into the home of Ramazith: Ramazith sold the mercenaries to an art collector
Degrodel gives the player six scrolls of stone to flesh to unpetrify the mercenaries
one of the mercenaries has the Helm of Balduran
description:
First of all, my name is Degrodel. I have been on the lookout for skilled adventurers. My task is very simple.
Some years ago, an evil band of mercenaries were all petrified while trying to break into the home of Ramazith. For those of you with a limited vocabulary, petrified means "turned to stone." Anyhow, one of those adventurers had in his possession an item of power: the Helm of Balduran. Ramazith didn't know this at the time and so, after turning them all to stone, he simply sold their bodies to an art collector living in the heart of Baldur's Gate.
What I would like you to do is find these statues, turn them back to flesh, and take the item. I will give you these six scrolls of stone to flesh. Use them on the statues when you find them.
The estate can be found just west of the fairgrounds in the center of town. Good luck, and don't entertain any thoughts about betraying me. It could be very hazardous to your health.
You will be paid 5,000 gold for this service. This is a kingly sum, so I won't barter with you about the amount.

name: Spiders in the Cloakwood
objective: investigate what happened to Chelak

items.name: "Spider's Bane"
items.description: a sword that was created to kill spiders

tools: Chelak found "Spider's Bane"
Chelak went to Cloakwood to clear the spider colony with "Spider's Bane"
description:
He-hello, travelers. I'm Tiber. Could... could I take up some of your time? I would be very grateful if you would just listen to... if you would just help me!
It's my brother, you see. He and I went into the Cloakwood to clear the woods of the spider colony that infests it. I know it sounds foolish... but my brother had found the sword "Spider's Bane"! The sword was created to kill spiders... and we thought we could become famous... the heroes of Cloakwood, and all that. But my brother hasn't returned yet... and it's been more than a week.
Please, could you go into the woods and find him for me? His name's Chelak. My mother would be so shattered if Chelak were to be dead.

name: Steal Algernon's Cloak
objective: bring Algernon's cloak to Pheirkas
first_tasks: steal Algernon's cloak off his person without killing him

characters.name: Algernon
characters.location: in his room in Feldepost's Inn

tools: NONE
description:
Hmm, I am Pheirkas and I prefer not to work with amateurs.
There's a fat man by the name of Algernon staying at Feldepost's Inn in Beregost. He keeps a cloak with him in his room and I need you to get your larcenous hands on it and bring it back to me.
I assure you that your reward will be handsome.
Try not to kill him, just filch it off his person.

name: The Captive Nymph
objective: investigate Ragefast and his nymph

first_task_locations.description: Ragefast's house, in the northwest part of the town

quest_giver.name: Lady Hannah
quest_giver.description: a noblewoman who is seething because of Ragefast

tools: Ragefast enslaved the nymph
Ragefast locked the nymph inside Ragefast's house
description:
You may call me Lady Hannah. Ragefast! Oh, he makes me seethe! He's a mage on a power trip and what does he do?
He acquires his own personal nymph and enslaves her in his quarters! Seek him out and look into this matter immediately! His house is in the northwest part of town.
I wish you luck and all the passion of my fury in your task.

name: A Nymph for Ramazith
objective: free Ragefast's nymph and bring her to Ramazith

characters.description: Ragefast's nymph, a female nymph, one of the most beautiful and useful creatures in Faerûn

tools: Ragefast imprisoned Ragefast's nymph in Ragefast's house
description:
Greetings to you and yours, my friend. I'm Ramazith.
Might I have your ear a moment? My proposition is thus: I would have you enter into the home of a colleague of mine and effect the release of a creature he has imprisoned there. Ragefast be his name, and he has in his possession one of the most beautiful and useful creatures in all of Faerûn. It's a nymph he captured some time ago, and I know not what laughable plans he has for her, but I am sure she be more... productive in my care.
I not so rich as to be able to offer huge gold, but as competent wizard I do have the odd magical item of worth. Perhaps an enchanted item will serve your needs, no?

name: The Firewine Ruins
objective: kill kobolds

first_task_locations.name: Firewine ruins
first_task_locations.description: a place where many have died in the past

locations.name: Gullykin
locations.description: a halfling village near the Firewine ruins

tools: NONE
description:
Well met, traveler. Gandolar Luckyfoot, at your disposal.
If I might pull on your coattail a moment more, I have a proposition for you. It's usually nature-quiet by the Firewine ruins, even with its violent bygone. Those who died and did not sleep have mostly found their rest over time. It's a live threat that comes now, with a band of kobolds that moved in.
Perhaps we could prevail upon you to rid us of this menace, and in return, a gift from us you shall receive. Keep whatever you find as well.

name: The Fishermen and the Priestess
objective: force the Priestess of the Bitch Queen Umberlee to leave the fishermen alone
first_tasks: find the Priestess of the Bitch Queen Umberlee

first_task_locations.description: near a small shack to the north

quest_giver.description: fishermen, who are being harassed by the Priestess of the Bitch Queen Umberlee

characters.name: Priestess of the Bitch Queen Umberlee
characters.description: a female priestess of the evil goddess of the sea
characters.location: near a small shack to the north

tools: NONE
description:
We're being harassed by a Priestess of the Bitch Queen Umberlee. We don't even know why, but whenever we attempt to fish she turns the weather sour. Two of us were washed away just walking to the docks, but we cannot prove to the guard it was her. We be needin' someone to strong-arm her into leaving us alone.
We've not much money, but I'll gladly give you a... magical weapon from my grandfather's adventuring days. It's a meager amount for your trouble, but it would be a great service to us.
Will you help a group of poor fishermen? She hides out near a small shack to the north. Watch yer back and act quickly; she's tricky.

name: The Gibberling Hordes
objective: help Laurel to fend off the gibberlings
tools: fire spells are effective on gibberlings
description:
I am called Laurel. I am a traveling paladin.
Ah, travelers, this wilderness is too expansive to keep clear of monsters all on my own. Many gibberlings pass through this very spot day and night. Will you stay here and help fend them off?
Fire magics work well against the gibberlings, so if you have such spells, use them.

name: The Seven Suns
objective: investigate the Seven Suns, and report back to Scar
first_tasks: break into the Seven Suns compound

characters.name: Jhasso
characters.description: the head of the Seven Suns, and an old friend of Scar

groups.name: Seven Suns
groups.description: an important trading coster in Baldur's Gate

groups.name: Flaming Fist
groups.description: a mercenary organization promoting order and law

groups.name: Grand Dukes
groups.description: a group of nobles who rule over Baldur's Gate

tools: the leadership of the Seven Suns have acted strangely lately by selling off valuable assets and neglecting many profitable trading ventures
Scar talked with Jhasso, but Jhasso rudely rebuffed Scar
use stealth while investigating the Seven Suns compound
description:
First off, let me introduce myself. I'm Scar, second-in-command of the Flaming Fist.
I need you to begin an investigation of the Seven Suns trading coster. The Seven Suns leadership has been acting strangely of late. They've been selling off valuable assets and neglecting many of their more profitable trading ventures. Considering the importance that the trading coster holds over the economy of the city, the Grand Dukes are noticeably upset. I've gone to talk to the coster's head, Jhasso. He rudely rebuffed me, telling me to mind my own business. I've known Jhasso for many years, and this isn't his usual behavior. I can't start up an official investigation, as there is no real reason for doing so. That's why I need you.
I want you to break into the Seven Suns compound and find out what's wrong. Use stealth in your investigations; I don't want this operation to cause too much fuss. The most important person to watch for is Jhasso.
Once you've found out as much as possible, report back to me at the Flaming Fist compound.
I'll pay you 2,000 gold for this favor.

name: The Silke Dilemma
objective: become a bodyguard for Silke Rosena

quest_giver.name: Garrick
quest_giver.description: a man who works for Silke Rosena

characters.name: Silke Rosena
characters.description: the most skilled musician and actor along the Sword Coast, a woman

tools: Feldepost hired some thugs to hurt Silke Rosena, because she did not perform at Feldepost's inn when she was supposed to
description:
Hail, adventurers. I'm Garrick, and I work for Silke Rosena. She's the most skilled musician and actor along the Sword Coast. 
I have a proposal for you. How would you like a well-paying job as a bodyguard for my mistress? She's been having some problems of late. Some thugs have been hired by Feldepost to hurt her bad because she didn't perform at his inn when she was supposed to. You can't blame her for not showing up, what with a villain like Feldepost running the place.
Just meet me outside of the Red Sheaf Inn, if you are interested in the job.

name: Investigate the Nashkel Mines
objective: find out what caused miners to go missing and ore to become tainted
tools: there is an iron shortage
description:
I am Berrun Ghastkill, mayor of Nashkel.
I need someone to descend into the mines southeast of town and find what has caused our miners to go missing and our ore to become tainted. It won't solve everything, but it's the first step to easing the effects of the iron shortage.
The town can give you a reward of 900 gold pieces. We are a small community and that is all we can afford.
Please, go now and do what you can.

name: Tremain's Son
objective: bring Casson's body to Tremain Belde'ar

characters.name: Casson
characters.description: the dead son of Tremain Belde'ar

tools: Casson was killed for trespassing the Water Queen's House
Tremain Belde'ar wants to resurrect Casson
description:
Greetings to you. I am Lord Priest Tremain Belde'ar, a humble servant of Our Smiling Lady Tymora.
My request of you is an odd and very dangerous one. I will not hold you to it if you deem it too extreme. I would have you enter the Water Queen's House and retrieve my son's, Casson's, body. Casson sought to indulge his restless nature by sneaking about the place, and a high price was paid.
You must bring Casson's body to me, that I may restore his life to him.

name: Vai's Bounty Upon Bandits
objective: find out why the bandit raids have been getting worse

quest_giver.name: Officer Vai
quest_giver.description: an officer of the Flaming Fist

groups.name: Flaming Fist
groups.description: a mercenary organization promoting order and law

tools: the bandits are working for someone
description:
I am Officer Vai of the Flaming Fist and, to be honest, I could use your help.
The bandit raids have been getting worse. I used to think that they were just your usual brigands out to make a quick buck in troubled times, but not anymore. They're working for someone... Damn it, this is a fine mess, isn't it?
I'll pay 50 gold pieces for every bandit scalp you can bring me — and spread the news. I want this whole region cleared, and I want to know what in the Nine Hells is going on here.

name: White Wolf Pelts
objective: bring a white wolf's pelt to the merchant

first_task_locations.name: Cloudpeak ice fields
first_task_locations.description: a bit to the south from here

tools: NONE
description:
I am but a humble merchant. Interested in a little business on the side, friend?
I've a man who swears by his grandmother he glimpsed a white wolf up in the Cloudpeak ice fields. It was but a short ways south, and she be easy pickings for a smart sword.
I'd pay you good money for its pelt, so it's a guaranteed sale if you go.
Keep it in mind on your travels.

name: Xvart Raids
objective: save Hulrik's cows
first_tasks: kill the xvarts that are attacking the cows
tools: xvarts and kobolds swarmed the Nashkel mines
xvarts and kobolds have started attacking livestock more and more often
description:
I'm Hulrik! You have to help me!
Them xvarts are after my cows again! Ever since them xvarts an' their kobold kin swarmed the mines at Nashkel, they've been makin' attacks like that more and more often.

name: Zhurlong's Missing Boots
objective: return Zhurlong's Boots of Stealth to their owner
first_tasks: find the hobgoblins who stole Zhurlong's Boots of Stealth

first_task_locations.description: the badlands to the south of Beregost

tools: NONE
description:
Hey, I'm Zhurlong! What is a thief to do, huh? You invest in some Boots of Stealth, you set up shop in the badlands to the south of Beregost and then, WHAM... Along comes a tribe of hobgoblins and they tear the boots from right off your feet!
Damn-blasted hobgoblin bullies... I'll pay you 100 gold pieces to show them who's boss and get those boots back...

name: Zombie Infestation
objective: return to Wenric after killing all zombies
tools: people around here have not been able to sleep for a week
description:
I be Wenric, a farmer by profession.
There's been something killing peoples in and 'round the farms here. Zombies or something. I can understands if you can't stomach the task but, just between you an' me real personal-likes, I don't know who else is gonna do it... All of us haves been goin' for a week now without sleep.
We've counted twenty zombies or so, so keep track as you kill 'em, if that's what you plans on doing.
Once you got 'em all, come back here and I'll gives you the 150 gold pieces that some of us have pooled together.

name: Zordral's Witchhunt
objective: save yourself and Bentha from Zordral's wrath
tools: the player walked on Zordral while he tried to kill Bentha
Zordral believes that Bentha is evil
Zordral thinks that the player is a threat to him and tries to kill the player too
description:
You there, stay back! If any of you come any closer, I'll kill her. I'm serious. Don't make me do it. All I have to do is say the last word of my spell and she'll die.
She's a witch. She'll use her magics to poison the children of this town. She'll butcher the livestock and she'll seduce the young men, make them her puppets. She must be killed!
Are you mocking me?! No one mocks the great Zordral. You will pay for your insolence!

name: A Tour of Durlag's Tower
objective: take a tour to Durlag's Tower
first_tasks: buy a tour to Durlag's Tower from Ike Cascadion Vendar

quest_giver.name: Ike Cascadion Vendar
quest_giver.description: a showy adventurer and tour guide

locations.name: Durlag's Tower
locations.description: a dangerous tower filled with traps

tools: Ike Cascadion Vendar is leading a tour to Durlag's Tower
the tour to Durlag's Tower costs 60 gold
description:
Step right up folks and HEAR the tale of dread placed before thee. Join with me as I, adventurer extraordinaire Ike Cascadion Vendar, lead yet another group of brave souls through the very SEAT of danger in the realms. To Durlag's Tower we shall go, and witness the perils that have taken the lives of hundreds of courageous men and women.
SEE the horror of the treacherous traps! FEEL the presence of the long languishing dead! MARVEL at the wondrous wealth buried below! NOT for the weak of spirit as I will NOT be held accountable for any heart failure during OR after our expedition! Step up, step up! One at a TIME!
A special package deal of 60 gold for you, not that you would need a discount.

name: The Reclusive Scholar
objective: travel to Balduran's Island to find Balduran's logbook for Mendas of Waterdeep
first_tasks: obtain the sea charts from the sea captain

first_task_locations.description: Merchants' League Counting House, northeast section of Baldur's Gate, northeast from Elfsong Tavern

tools: The Merchants' League found Balduran's shipwreck on Balduran's Island
Mendas of Waterdeep wants to get Balduran's logbook before the merchants destroy it while they search for treasure
The Merchants' League keeps the sea charts locked up
Mendas of Waterdeep will give the player some gold to obtain the sea charts
description:
I am Mendas of Waterdeep, quester of small truth in this land. I am in need of favor from you. Can you help a gentle fellow in search for knowledge?
The Merchants' League sailors found Balduran's shipwreck on a small island. I wish to recover the ship's logbook. I will solve mystery of Balduran's final voyage. Merchants' League will destroy my artifacts to get treasure. This must not happen! If you help me, I get things precious to me, you get treasure, merchant men get nothing. You will help, yes?
These men that find island, they keep the sea charts locked up. In Baldur's Gate, there is building in northeast section of city called Merchants' League Counting House. To find it, just go northeast from Elfsong Tavern. The sea charts, they are in there. Most likely, captain of ship will have them. I don't know such things as chart retrieval, but you are hero, and it is no problem for heroes.
There might be small danger, so I give you some gold for the charts.

name: Delainy's Task
objective: bring the cloak to Delainy
tools: the cloak is an important symbol of old times
the cloak draped the village center
the recent storm moved the cloak beyond the village walls
there are beasts outside the village walls
description:
My name is Delainy, and I am pleasured to meet ye. I seek the return of an item, more an icon.
No doubt you felt the storm that passed just by and by? Village-home did as well, and the cloak that draped the village center was cast to the wind. I think it is beyond the wall, and will not risk the beasts to get it. Will you?
I can offer little besides my gratitude. The cloak is a keepsake, a symbol of old times.

name: Durlyle's Task
objective: bring the cloak that draped the village center back to Durlyle
tools: a storm sank the player's ship
there are beasts outside the village wall
description:
I am Durlyle, and I am glad to be meeting. I have but a mundane task to ask of you, if you hear me out?
The storm you felt that took your ship? It was fierce here too, and a cloak that draped the village center was cast to the wind. I think it is beyond the wall, and will not risk the beasts to get it. Will you?

name: Evalt's Missing Brother
objective: find Evan

first_task_locations.description: along the west coast of Balduran's Isle

tools: Evan sought out the Blue Lady and disappeared
Evalt thinks that Evan is under the Blue Lady's spell
description:
I am Evalt, I fish for clan in these savage waters. Listen, outsider, may I ask you for help?
There is a witch on this isle. My brother called her the Blue Lady and those of us who ply these waters have all heard her singing at one time or another. My brother, Evan, heard her more than most. I think that he went to find her. I think that he is under her spell. I must go and find him. This witch might kill him. He is strong but he is under her spell. I fear that she will kill him before he realizes what is happening. Can you find my brother?
I don't know exactly where the Blue Lady is. I have the sense to avoid her, unlike Evan. But I have only heard her singing along the west coast of the island.

name: Farthing's Dolly
objective: return Farthing's doll to her
tools: the gatekeeper won't let Farthing go and get her doll
description:
My name's Farthing. I'm only five. In a few years my papa will let me hunt. Are you allowed to hunt?
I've lost my dolly out in the woods. The gatekeeper won't let me go and get it. Can you get it for me?

name: Galken's Wardstone
objective: get the ward token that opens the way to the labyrinths beneath Durlag's Tower from Galken

locations.name: Durlag's Tower
locations.description: a tower atop untouched dungeons filled with riches

tools: Galken gives the player the ward token if the player settles his bar tab
description:
I'm Galken. Hey, how'd you like to be supping on fine venison and tippin' back the good stuff?
I've the key to wealth legendary if you're up for it. No doubt you've heard of the labyrinth at Durlag's Tower, eh? And how she's been pillaged so often that fat nobles go there for picnics? Well, the TOWER has, but BELOW are dungeons untouched! I've a token, a ward token to be sure, that gives entry to them.
'Tis yours if you'll but settle my tab so I can leave this fine place... with all my limbs intact.

name: Jondal's Murder
objective: avenge Jondal for Kryla
first_tasks: kill the werewolves that killed Jondal
tools: NONE
description:
Oh, please help me! I'm Kryla. They kill poor Jondal. The wolf-men.
They attack us as we search for roots in the forest. Please avenge my Jondal. He was so young...
They are this way. Please kill them, I am so frightened.

name: Maralee's Child
objective: return Peladan to Maralee

first_task_locations.description: northeast of the village, in the woods

tools: Maralee's husband took Peladan hunting: werewolves attacked Peladan and his father
Peladan went missing, but Maralee's husband was killed
Peladan and Maralee's husband have dark hair
description:
Hello, good people. I am Maralee. Two moons ago my husband took my son out hunting with him. They were attacked by those horrible wolf-creatures. They... they killed my husband and took my baby.
Others say that they took the baby away to eat him, but I know he's still alive. He's a beautiful little boy with dark hair like his father. He is three moons old and his name is Peladan.
They took him from my husband northeast of the village, in the woods.

name: Palin and the Monsters
objective: save people from monsters
tools: NONE
description:
Good day to you, stranger. I'm called Palin. Excuse my, uhm, abruptness but I would ask your assistance.
Just east of this place there are monsters. They are attacking a small group of people. Please, if you have hearts, come and help me fight.

name: Recovering "Soultaker"
objective: bring the "Soultaker" to Hurgan Stoneblade

quest_giver.name: Hurgan Stoneblade
quest_giver.description: a man residing in Citadel Adbar

items.name: "Soultaker"
items.description: a dagger that belonged to Hurgan Stoneblade's grandpa

characters.name: Durlag
characters.description: a legendary hero who went mad after his family was killed

tools: Hurgan Stoneblade's grandpa was killed by a demon
Durlag intended to send "Soultaker" to Hurgan Stoneblade's mother
Durlag did not send "Soultaker": his family was replaced with doppelgangers and he was driven mad after killing the doppelgangers
description:
I am Hurgan Stoneblade, presently residing in Citadel Adbar. Have I got the adventure that'll make ye yearn for glory!
Ye have heard of Durlag's Tower, mayhaps? Me granda' was a good friend of Durlag's. Me granda' was slain by an evil demon but Durlag survived. Durlag kept "Soultaker" that had been me granda's. He was going to send it to me mother, but he was betrayed. A sad tale, that.
After Durlag built the tower his family was replaced by doppelgangers. Durlag killed them all but was driven mad by the act. He entrapped his tower heavily and forgot about me granda's dagger.
If ye be interested, I wish to hire ye to retrieve me granda's dagger, "Soultaker," me birthright.
An enchanted hammer I can offer ye for yer services.

name: De'Tranion's Liquor
objective: give a jug of this town's hardest liquor to Captain Tollar Kieres

characters.name: De'Tranion
characters.description: an old coot who brews liquor

tools: NONE
description:
Ohoy, I'm Captain Tollar Kieres.
A jug o' this town's hardest liquor would make for a fine departure, if ye'd be so kind.
Old De'Tranion brews a vile swill at'll do the trick. Ye can find the old coot at the Blushing Mermaid.

name: Therella's Missing Son
objective: find out what happened to Dalton

first_task_locations.name: Durlag's Tower
first_task_locations.description: a dangerous tower owned by Durlag

characters.name: Dalton
characters.description: Therella's son who wants to be a hero

tools: Dalton went on an adventure to Durlag's Tower
Dalton and his fellow adventurers bought a ward token from Galken
Dalton did not return from Durlag's Tower
description:
Greetings, adventurer. I have, or perhaps I should say had, a son named Dalton. He fell in with a crew of adventurers from Waterdeep. Dalton was always obsessed with the idea of being a hero.
Alas, he has neither the brains nor the ability. Such is a mother's lot in life, however, to watch her children perform acts of idiocy despite her warnings or concerns.
He and his thick-skulled cohorts took it upon themselves to plumb the depths of Durlag's Tower. They bought a ward token from that shyster, Galken, and made ready to leave. Though I begged and cried, Dalton still insisted on going. The band never returned. I fear that they were destroyed by the mad dwarf's machinations. That is the tale, sad but true.
Please find my son if he still lives.

name: Magreb and Rilsa
objective: avenge Rilsa and give her a proper burial

first_task_locations.description: a set of caves to the northeast

characters.location: a set of caves to the northeast

tools: goblins first appeared around the house of an old mage
the old mage was captured by goblins
description:
Goblins! All I know is they killed Rilsa when she tried to talk to them, and I can't face them by myself. At first they appeared around the house of an old mage, but soon they moved into a set of caves to the northeast, taking him with them.
Forgive me. My name is Magreb. Rilsa and I have watched over this area for years, and we never had any trouble with goblins before. Since they killed her, I've been half out of my mind with grief.
Please avenge my Rilsa and give her a proper burial!

name: A duel with Shar-Teel Dosan
objective: win duel against Shar-Teel Dosan
first_tasks: select the male party member who shall duel Shar-Teel Dosan

reward.description: Shar-Teel Dosan joins the player's party

tools: the player is the leader of a party of adventurers that has both men and women: Shar-Teel Dosan only duels men
if Shar-Teel Dosan wins the duel the player has to give 20 gold to her
Shar-Teel Dosan will kill anyone who tries to interfere the duel
description:
Hold, traveler! I, Shar-Teel Dosan, challenge your best warrior to a duel. I don't fight women, so only men should step forward.
I win, and you give me 20 gold. In the unlikely event that one of you bests me, I'll pledge my sword to your cause, however stupid it may be..
Will your champion step forward? I only fight men, so your women will have to be satisfied with just watching. Don't entertain any thoughts about cheating. If any of the rest of you try to interfere in this fight, I'll kill them outright.

name: An Offer from Taerom
objective: sell your ankheg shells
first_tasks: give your ankheg shells to Taerom Fuiruim
tools: ankheg armor is comparable to full plate with half the weight
there is an iron shortage
description:
Hello there, I'm Taerom Fuiruim, a blacksmith of some renown.
An interesting piece o' material you got there. Ankheg, if I'm not mistaken. Been a while since I seen the like, but if I remember correctly, it makes a fine set of armor. If properly treated it's comparable to full plate with half the weight!
If you're willing to part with your shells I'll give you 500 gold for the lot of them. No more can I offer with business as slow as it is.
Iron shortage hurting us all.

name: The Tale of Commander Brage
objective: kill Commander Brage

quest_giver.description: a guard in a bad mood

characters.name: Commander Brage
characters.description: the former commander of the guard

tools: Commander Brage found a cursed sword and killed his family
Commander Brage was a well-liked man before the cursed sword changed him
description:
State your business with the guard and go! Oh, that came out a bit harsher than I meant. I am sorry for my mood. All the guard are still grieving the loss of Commander Brage.
The commander was friend to many before he found a cursed sword. He's not the man he was, by Helm. I'll not believe a man of Brage's rank could kill his own family. 'Twas evil magics of some sort. An entire unit went west after Brage to try to talk some sense to him. It's been a week, and none have returned.
The reward for the commander's head is a king's ransom, but I'll not be lifting MY sword against a brother soldier.
Travel lightly, wanderer. The woods harbor strange things.

name: Coran the Wyvern Hunter
objective: bring the wyvern's head to the mayor of Beregost
first_tasks: find the wyvern's nest with Coran and kill the wyvern

enemies.name: wyvern
enemies.description: a dragon-like creature with a barbed tail

tools: the player met Coran in this wood
the mayor of Beregost hired Coran to hunt down a dragon with a barbed tail: Coran knows that dragons do not have barbed tails
description:
It's refreshing to find other people in this wood. I am Coran, thief and archer!
I've been alone in the wilderness for far too long. I wouldn't mind returning to the big city, but I have yet to collect my bounty. I'd share the reward with the lot of you if you would help hasten the hunt.
The deal is this: I've been hired out by the mayor of Beregost to hunt down a great winged dragon that's been plaguing the caravan routes. He's offered 2,000 gold for its head. Now before you get cold feet, let me allay your fears. The only descriptions of the beast have always mentioned its deadly barbed tail. From what I know about dragons they don't have barbs on their tails — that's something unique to wyverns. So all we have to do is find this wyvern's nest and kill it. Our only worries are if it has friends over for dinner!
We shouldn't tarry any longer; let's collect the head of this soon-to-be-sorry wyvern.

name: Eldoth and Skie
objective: capture Skie with Eldoth
first_tasks: help Skie escape from her father

reward.description: hoards of blackmail cash from Entar Silvershield

characters.name: Entar Silvershield
characters.description: one of the dukes of Baldur's Gate, and Skie's father

tools: Eldoth and the player can blackmail money from Entar Silvershield after capturing Skie
Eldoth will join the player's party
description:
I'm Eldoth, a traveling bard. Pleased to make your acquaintance. You look like the type to be on the outlook for ways to improve the quality of your life.
Well, I have a proposal that could help you in that endeavor. You see, there's a girl, my lover in fact, who desires to escape her father and live on her own. Her father is Entar Silvershield, one of the dukes of Baldur's Gate. This, of course, makes her desires more difficult than that of the average city girl.
However, with your assistance, we could help her escape the tyrannical clutches of Entar. Here's the punchline: Since Entar's going to be hunting us anyway, we can blackmail him for hoards of cash and not worry about our captive escaping. After all, we're doing it all for the sake of Skie.
Now, we needn't go about this right away. In fact, I'll help you with whatever you're doing until you decide to head up to Baldur's Gate. Just think of it as one favor deserving another.

name: Ludrug's Band
objective: win the duel against Ludrug
first_tasks: choose your champion to fight against Ludrug
tools: the player has trespassed gnolls' territory with the player's party
the gnolls' demand 50 gold from the player, but the player doesn't have any money
description:
Stop! You have trespassed on our territory. You shall not be allowed to leave until you have paid tribute. We demand 50 gold in tribute!
No money? That is too bad for you. We let you go only if you win fight. Your best champion versus our best champion. Our best champion is Ludrug. Ludrug is me. Are you ready for fight? No matter, we fight now!
If you lose, you must die! If you win, we must let you pass! Tread carefully, we will be watching you.

name: Missing Citizens
objective: discover what's been happening with the disappearing citizens, and come see Scar
first_tasks: patrol and find an entrance to the sewers

groups.name: Flaming Fist
groups.description: a mercenary organization promoting order and law

tools: Scar knows the player
every night people have been disappearing from the streets of the city
possible tracks of a many-legged centipede-like monster have been found
description:
It is I, Scar, second-in-command of the Flaming Fist. I have another job you might be interested in. You'll be well paid for your services.
The problem is this: Every night people have been disappearing from the streets of the city. My men have been scouring the city trying to find the culprit, but so far to no avail. People have begun to get scared, and very few are willing to leave their homes at night. Something has to be done, and quickly. Would you be willing to take the job? I'd pay you 300 gold in advance with a 1,000 gold bonus if you discover what's been happening with the disappearing citizens.
Your job is really simple. All I want you to do is patrol the east of the city and find an entrance to the sewers. Perhaps you'll get lucky and find out what's been happening. If you do find out what's been happening, come to see me at the Flaming Fist barracks. Our only clue so far has led us to the sewers, so if you want to explore them first, it would probably be a good idea. Also, we've found tracks of some many-legged creature, perhaps a centipede-like monster.

name: Aldeth and the Group of Savages
objective: protect Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends from a group of savages
first_tasks: prepare for the savages' attack on Aldeth Sashenstar's cottage
tools: Aldeth Sashenstar has been holed up in a cabin for several days
the savages threatened Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends to stop hunting
the savages killed Elban
description:
I am Aldeth Sashenstar. You must understand that at the moment, I'm under a terrible amount of stress.
You see, my dear friend, there is a group of uncouth savages that has declared their intention of killing my friends and me. I've been holed up in this cabin for several days and have lacked the wherewithal to try to make an escape.
My friends and I come here every year to do some sport hunting. This year however, a group of woodland savages threatened us with bodily harm if we did not stop our hunting trip. Being civilized men, we realized that it's well within our rights to hunt where we damn well please. After a few more days of hunting, the crass woodmen lost all pretense of humanity and murdered Elban, one of my oldest friends.
I'm sure that they plan to attack our cottage here, so we had best be prepared.

name: Investigating the Merchants' League Estate
objective: investigate Irlentree and Zorl Miyar, and report back to Aldeth Sashenstar
first_tasks: go with Aldeth Sashenstar, let him introduce you as his old friend and quarter you in the guest chambers

first_task_locations.description: Merchants' League Estate, the headquarters of the Merchants' League

quest_giver.name: Aldeth Sashenstar
quest_giver.description: one of the principal shareholders of the Merchants' League

tools: the player saved Aldeth Sashenstar on his hunting trip
Aldeth Sashenstar thinks that Irlentree and Zorl Miyar have become different people when he was gone: they spend their and Aldeth Sashenstar's company's resources on frivolous and stupid ideas
description:
It is so pleasant to see your face once again. Don't you recognize me? It is I, Aldeth Sashenstar. I am so glad to have met you, especially at a time like this. I need to speak with you privately.
I'm sorry for all of this hiding and skulking, but there are dire events afoot. You know that I am one of the principal shareholders of the Merchants' League. Well, I share ownership of the company with two others: Irlentree and Zorl Miyar, two very distinguished gentlemen. When I returned from my hunting trip — thanks to you, I might add — I found that my two partners had undergone some profound changes, nothing physical or overt, but something far more sinister.
It's as if my partners had become wholly different people while I was gone. They almost take an active interest in squandering our company's resources on frivolous and stupid ideas. If they continue on this course, the company will be in shambles in but a few weeks. I know you have already helped me once, but I ask for your assistance again. I have no other recourse.
Come into the Merchants' League Estate with me. I will explain that you are an old friend of mine and will quarter you in the guest chambers. From there, please investigate my partners, perhaps using magic or any of the other skills you possess. Learn as much as you can during your visit and then report back to me after you're done. It should only take a couple of days.

name: A Mage Imprisoned?
objective: free Vithal

first_task_locations.description: in the cavern north of here

quest_giver.name: Uder Mordin
quest_giver.description: a man who witnessed a battle between Vithal and a powerful opponent

reward.description: Vithal was trying to uncover an artifact of old

characters.name: Vithal
characters.description: a powerful male mage, who was magically confined

tools: NONE
description:
I would be careful in this place, if I were you. Many dangers around many corners. You will be lucky to live. No real secrets for those that travel here frequently.
A trespasser got his due from someone he crossed. Well, I suppose it did not end in death, but it was a mighty battle regardless. I do not know who the aggressor was, but I know who lost.
That person was a mage of power, I am sure, though not powerful enough in the end. A pity too. He seemed intent on unearthing an artifact of old or some such.
And his reward for his effort? Worse than death, even though he seemed willing to share. Imprisoned, magically confined in the cavern north of here. Pity.

name: A Mage's Proposal
objective: help Vithal breach the walls between dimensions

first_task_locations.description: a svirfneblin village to the north

reward.description: items for the player and Vithal

tools: the player released Vithal from imprisonment
Vithal lost his book of rituals
Vithal needs the book of rituals to breach the walls between dimensions
description:
Ahh! Thank you for releasing me. I'm Vithal, an adventuring mage. If you could aid me a bit, I would be forever grateful. There will be items enough for us both.
